actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public.employee
  SET 
	name = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_name}}',
	title = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_title}}',
	email_id = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_email}}',
	personal_email_id = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_personal_email}}',
	birthday = '{{moment(edit_emp_form.data?.emp_birthday).format('DD/MM/YYYY')}}',
	gender = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_gender}}',
	start_date = '{{moment(edit_emp_form.data?.emp_startdate).format('DD/MM/YYYY')}}',
	status = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_status}}',
	primary_department = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_primary_pod}}',
	secondary_department = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_otherpods.toString()}}',
	manager_email = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_manager}}',
	employee_id = {{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_id}},
	location_country = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_country}}',
	location_state = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_state}}',
	location_city = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_city}}',
	location_pin_code = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_pincode}}',
	delivery_address = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_address}}',
	nationality = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_nationality}}',
	area_of_expertise = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_expertise}}',
	horizontal = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_horizontal}}',
	salary_portal = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_salary_portal}}',
	onboarding_buddy_email_id = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_buddy}}',
	phone_number = '{{edit_emp_form.data?.emp_phone}}',
	country_code = '{{emp_phone.dialCode.replace('+', '')}}',
	photo = '{{this.params.photo}}' 
	WHERE id = {{get_emp_by_id.data[0]?.id}};
